EmailTemplate.name: ENG-VDI Campaign Q417.01-VDI Campaign Q417-Case Study.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: How CGI Assures Performance Of Their VDI Environment
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-CGI-Success-Story.pdf?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Bus03]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, CGI is a leading global IT and business process services provider. Keeping this global company moving forward are the Shared Service Support Teams. Throughout 2015 this team was tasked with rolling out a VDI solution for CGI. Like many VDI rollouts they were encountering performance issues during the deployment. Click below to learn how CGI used Turbonomic to maximize the utilization of their existing hardware and successfully rollout a 4,000 seat VDI environment. <[[http://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-CGI-Success-Story.pdf?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Bus03]]> - The Turbonomic Team
